extension.name: copilot-more-models
extension.description: VS Code code completion and editing extension with support for Claude, GPT-4, and more models.
error.languageModelNotAvailable: Language Model API not available. Please ensure GitHub Copilot Chat is installed.
error.invalidToolName: Invalid tool name "{0}": only alphanumeric characters, hyphens, and underscores are allowed.
error.tooManyTools: Cannot have more than 128 tools per request.
error.toolModeNotSupported: LanguageModelChatToolMode.Required is not supported with more than one tool
error.toolResultsRequired: Tool call must be followed by User message with tool results
